messages.content: Sadly enough I was thinking the same.
The sad part about this is that these memes are more Gen Z if anything...
It's real enough sadly. Kin have been around for awhile in their own corners of the net.
Hold my wine, I have to go vomit in sorrow.
Still is glitched to this day.... sad
This whole sub makes me sad.
I really pity those unfree Cuban babies. It’s just sad.
This is something kids do on their twitch streams to get subs, pretty sad.
I'm just really sad all that cake was wasted.
I'm sad for the bot. They only want a purpose
Sadly there's a good chance that you still need a car anyway because that affordable neighborhood will involve a one hour commute.
It also makes me cry! but because it shows how far [NAME] has fallen...
The comments on this thread are what I expected and that makes me sad.
This hits hard, sadly both of my relationships have been toxic so I've decided not to start any new ones until I start going to uni
Calm down snowflake. Comment stalking from a week ago is really sad, especially when you're whining about something that I'm 100% right on.
I see you utilized it. 3.5? Sad.
I'm a little sad that there's not actually a video called Dance of the Hillary, virus or not.
No, what’s sad is saying the same message like it’s news. He’s a copy paste machine. No original thought.
Can't relate because the sadness and loneliness is constant 😎
Wife left me and I am just broken. relapsed tonight from 7 years clean and just not seeing a point anymore
Im so sad how that movie turned out. We could have achived something good
I feel so bad for [NAME]. It was probably hard to concentrate on this match with the things going on in his personal life
I always feel so bad for [NAME] when I watch this scene.
Oh boy do I have some bad news for you!
Gonna be sad when Gameday is inside a gym for shooty hoops. I already miss CFB :(
This is so cringey it hurts. I feel so bad for whoever sent this because they are so stupid.
Girlfriend weak as well, that jump was pathetic.
I never understood the part where he dives into a pile of money, even as a child. It seems wildly painful.
I feel extremely bad for people in this thread who are in any way shape or form relying on the federal government to improve their situation.
it's hurting my heart :( why did you leave me
Well 216 is out now and Im crying. [NAME] why?
I know, right?! I was literally in tears Saturday night 😪 It's only 3 years old!!
Oh man that hurt to watch
This, in top of my already terrible mental health, is the reason why I'm severely underweight and need help.
I am trying they try to say I’m fake even though I’m trying it’s painful to talk to them sometimes
It’s a cruel thing to say to someone with depression.
I literally just finished watching the second episode of Daredevil. This pains me
You'll miss a begging old man asking for a spare coin. RIP
If you have schools in your city, I got bad news for ya champ...
Must be a tough life when all you can think about is sad stories to keep you from enjoying anything.
This happens to me all the time I’m so sorry 😣 it’s always with burgers, too. So painful.
Omg what the ever loving bloody hell did I just read?? As an artist, this was extra painful to me.
The fact you have to explain this at the third grade level is pathetic. People think somone preventing his own murder is a tragedy.
My dad wears that sweater every game day! It’s in much worse condition however
No one makes it through. We all die. Just some sooner than others.
Girl I went to school with was killed like this.
It was a painful cringe, too. Are we masochists?
This is exactly what it's been like. I feel personally victimised by it all
Oh my gosh. This woman who died also had a son who died. Holy tragedy
Oh hell no. Shes blind!!! No way in HELL is she ever being left alone with it.
At home with a viral infection right now! Praying for death and to the god of paracetamol. Ugh.
